p: Several covariates could be excluded from this analysis. Estimates obtained from the simulated full genome sequence datasets were not more strongly associated with estimation error than estimates obtained using the phylogenetic trees from which the sequences were simulated ( supplementary fig. S9 and supplementary table S7, Supplementary Material online). Shorter, intense sampling periods after intervention start of 3 years compared with a default of 5 years were also not strongly associated with larger estimation error ( supplementary table S7, Supplementary Material online).
